introduction.title: My Skills
introduction.text: In my time at INSA, I've dedicated myself to enhancing my knowledge and skills in information technology. Here is a list of skills I have acquired.

skills.title: Programming Languages
skills.text: Strong foundation in programming languages such as /Python/, /JavaScript/, /C++/, /Java/ and /Kotlin/.

skills.title: Database Management
skills.text: Firm basis in /SQL/ with database management systems like /MySQL/, /PostgreSQL/ and  aussi experience in non relational database like /MongoDB/, /Firebase/.

skills.title: Web Development
skills.text: Proficient in /HTML/, /CSS/, and /JavaScript/ with /Reactjs/ framework for front-end web development, as well as back-end technologies like /Node.js/

skills.title: Android Development
skills.text: Being familiar with /Kotlin/ and knowing the basics of /Jetpack Compose/ for Android App development.

skills.title: Version Control
skills.text: Solid foundation in /Git/, adept at managing code changes and resolving conflicts. Proficient in utilizing /GitHub/ and /GitLab/ for version control, collaboration, and continuous integration.

skills.title: Docker
skills.text: Understanding of /Docker/ and /Docker Compose/, skilled in containerizing applications and orchestrating multi-container deployments.

skills.title: Data Structures, Algorithms
skills.text: Knowledge of various /data structures/ (arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, etc.) and /algorithms/ for efficient problem-solving.

skills.title: Design
skills.text: Proficient in using /Adobe Photoshop/ for graphic design, with the ability to create and edit digital images. Also experienced in /Figma/ for UI/UX design, capable of creating intuitive and user-friendly interfaces.
